law.catch_line: Effect of payments on determination of need and eligibility for student aid.
law.text: No student loan program, student grant program or other program administered by any agency of the Commonwealth, except as may be otherwise provided by federal law or the provisions of any specific grant applicable thereto, shall take into account and consider amounts available for the payment of higher education costs pursuant to the Kentucky Educational Savings Plan Trust in determining need and eligibility for student aid.
law.history: Created 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 88, sec. 12, effective July 15, 1988.
